programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 3 Ep32
programme.desc: Qari Cilik Indonesia kembali untuk musim ketiga, menampilkan kanak-kanak berbakat dalam seni tilawah Al-Quran. Saksikan perjalanan para peserta muda dalam menyampaikan bacaan yang indah dan penuh makna.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep191
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Ujian Kesabaran Ibu Penjual Angkringan Di Bulan Yang Penuh Ampunan
programme.desc: Mak Lela kini tinggal bersama anaknya, Lukman dan keluarga selepas pengsan di gerai kereta sorongnya. Isteri Luqman, Santi dan anak perempuan, Nada berasa kurang senang dengan kehadiran dan nasihat Mak Leha. Mereka akan menyeksa Mak Leha apabila Luqman tiada di rumah.

programme.title: Mulianya Ramadan Ep3
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan hiburan berunsur keagamaan untuk memeriahkan malam Ramadan anda, dengan muzik yang memberi semangat, dakwah yang penuh inspirasi, dan hiburan yang menyentuh hati.

programme.title: Love Clinique
programme.desc: Dong-ju joins school choir for Min-soo even she is tone-deaf. They reunite 10 years later. She wants to impress him so she enrolls in a vocal training clinic where Shin-hong trains her...

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter suffer from a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: Cobweb
programme.desc: Director Kim has completed filming Cobweb, but he decided to re-shoot the ending. With chaos and people don't understand the new ending, will Kim be able to complete his masterpiece?

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: The President'S Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: She'S On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Countdown (2023)
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: A disgraced Korean researcher claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: When a bad-boy movie star hires a real gangster to take on an opposing role to avoid a scandal after beating a fellow actor half to death, he gets more than he bargained for from this replacement.

programme.title: Herb
programme.desc: A 20-year-old woman with mild mental disorder falls in love with a policeman but must face heartbreak when she is forced to deal with certain realities about herself and those around her.

programme.title: Set Me Free
programme.desc: Being abandoned in a group home since young, Young-Jae now struggles to make a living as he's too old to live there anymore.

programme.title: Citizen Of A Kind
programme.desc: Duk-hee receives a call from a bank offering a loan. After sending money for fees, she realizes that was a scam. She receives another call one day. This time, it's a plea for help...

programme.title: Iris: The Movie
programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: Hello Ghost
programme.desc: A man has many failed suicide attempts. After the most recent one, he discovers he can see a family of ghosts. The ghosts agree to leave him alone under the condition that he fulfill their requests.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: Citizen Of A Kind
programme.desc: Duk-hee receives a call from a bank offering a loan. After sending money for fees, she realizes that was a scam. She receives another call one day. This time, it's a plea for help...

programme.title: Cobweb
programme.desc: Director Kim has completed filming Cobweb, but he decided to re-shoot the ending. With chaos and people don't understand the new ending, will Kim be able to complete his masterpiece?

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Love Clinique
programme.desc: Dong-ju joins school choir for Min-soo even she is tone-deaf. They reunite 10 years later. She wants to impress him so she enrolls in a vocal training clinic where Shin-hong trains her...

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: She'S On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: The World of the Married Ep1
programme.desc: Ji Sun-woo, a successful doctor, is married to Lee Tae-oh, an aspiring filmmaker. Their marriage, however, starts to fall apart when Lee engages in an extra-marital affair.

programme.desc: Celebrities are invited to join and reveal their experience and love stories in Season Six to help the guests to find true love. The show aims to interpret youngsters views on marriage and love through discussion among different generation.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Season 3 Ep2
programme.desc: A dating program designed for singles or divorced people who have passed the age of marriage. 4 male guests and 3 female guests would join the one-to-one communication in sequence per episode. The guests who are under the stage would be arranged to a room, to communicate more and deepen their understanding with each other. Love never comes late!

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep9
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.title: Mystery In The Box Ep6
programme.desc: All-celebrities immersive storyline experience variety show; revolving around the elements of gaming and comedy, it is based on current social hot topics to create different game themes. In a boxed space, a group of mysterious players need to gradually uncover the truth of the story through various bizarre, hilarious, and twisted situations, break free from the box, and embark on a unique journey of spiritual healing.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep244
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep246
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5059
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary Moonwatch. Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: The number one killer in SDU, Chow Sing Sing(Stephen Chow), is sent to a school to find a lost gun. His partner Tat(Ng Man Tat) pretends to be a school worker in assisting him. They recognize that some students are being closed with Fei, the head of triad society, and Fei traffics munitions. Sing steals and ignites Fei's munitions; Fei pledges to kill Sing...

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kongs greatest filmmakers. It traces Huis life story and her 40-year careers ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various human experiments and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to stay with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil begins to unfold!

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: The Fierce Wife
programme.desc: An Zhen divorces her husband after his infidelity but faces a pivotal decision four years later - to return to her cheating husband and old life or to embark on a new life with a new love?

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Ah Ma visits Phua Chu Kang, who is now based in Malaysia, but soon goes missing. Phua desperately searches for Ah Ma and finds her in a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, who unexpectedly offers Phua a renovation job. When suspicious deaths start occurring in the nursing home, Lim becomes the prime suspect. How will Phua resolve this?

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Web Of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called Five Poison Web, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Call To Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Big Brother Cheng fled from the mainland to Hong Kong, where he opened a teahouse in a housing estate, hoping to find a peaceful life. However, relentless provocations from local triad gangs go unaddressed by the police, prompting Cheng and his friends at the teahouse to seek revenge.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Call Of The Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Woman Of The Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his fathers deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - Twelve Deadly Coins and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Yings father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt Shaolin Hand Lock from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Lings house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Honey Bunny In Jungle Adventure Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.title: Paap O Meter Ep57
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep9

programme.desc: A team of scientists braves the dangers of the rain forest in search of a flower that contains a youth serum.

programme.title: Days Of Thunder
programme.desc: A hotshot stock car racer finds more than fame in the south - love for a neurosurgeon who has a marked disdain for racing.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
programme.desc: Bella and Edward find their lives in turmoil after discovering she is pregnant. It's not long before her health is suffering, while meanwhile the wolf pack suspect the child could be their downfall.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: The Water Horse
programme.desc: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

programme.title: Planet Earth II S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Deserts - The world's deserts are lands of extremes that force animals to adapt in clever ways to cope with the hostile conditions, producing some incredible survival stories.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secrets of Success - The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar - Journey across Madagascar, the oldest island on Earth. Over time, it has given rise to more unique plants and animals - from its famed lemurs to colourful chameleons - than any other island.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Series 4, Episode 4 - In New South Wales, Australia, the worst bushfires in recent history attack multiple towns - overwhelming firefighters and trapping tourists at a lake front caravan park.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Michelle Rodriguez - Actress Michelle Rodriguez and Bear Grylls head to the Nevada. Unexpected high winds during a sky-diving trip send Michelle off course; finally the duo must come up with clever ways to stay hydrated.

programme.title: Wild City: Secret World
programme.desc: Almost 30,000 species of animals make their home in Singapore, but many of them remain largely invisible to us. From banded bullfrogs that do battle in rain-sodden drains, to predatory mantises that hunt in suburban gardens, unseen drama unfold all around the city on a daily basis.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Ed Helms - Actor Ed Helms faces sheer cliffs, crumbling rock and a cringeworthy dinner menu while atop Colorado mountains; Helms discusses the road to his career in comedy.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Lion numbers continue to grow, but there's not enough food to go around; a lioness mum risks her life to feed her five cubs; Xudum's newborn leopard cubs face a deadly threat.

programme.title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Spain S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Anton and Giovanni's epic road trip across Spain continues, and it's Benidorm or bust as the boys take on the Costa Blanca before heading to the country's capital, Madrid.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mamma Etna - Mount Etna, Europe's most active volcano, is experiencing its longest spate of eruptions in recent years. Our story starts almost a year earlier, long before the eruptions reach full force. Etna fires off intermittently and, on the summit, a new volcanic crater grows.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Ed Helms - Actor Ed Helms faces sheer cliffs, crumbling rock and a cringeworthy dinner menu while atop Colorado mountains; Helms discusses the road to his career in comedy.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Yukon Wild - The Yukon is a true wilderness, one of the last on Earth. The vast land got its name from its longest river, which the Gwichin, one of the indigenous people of the region, call "Yu-kun- ah", or, the "great river". The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3,000 km Northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep1
programme.desc: A Summer to Remember - Dive into a busy summer at the RSPCA Wildlife Hospital, where vet Emily takes the pressure off a gassy koala mum. Shadow the team as they fight a wave of lorikeet paralysis syndrome and see vet Karina use a teddy bear to rescue a flying fox pup.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep2
programme.desc: A Prickly Problem - Join vets Emily and Martine in the OR, where Dolly the koalas spaying surgery takes a scary turn. Aid a run-over echidna with vet Nigel, see rescue officer Chantelles slick fix for a snared lizard, and probe a possible birdnapping with vet Karina.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Katis territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystals move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Garden Route - In a park where land meets sea, the natural elements combine to create wonderful variety. Cola-colored water feeds forests green and dense. Fire and wind fuel growth in great diversity and rock shapes a coastline of many faces. Life thrives here - from the magnificent to the bizarre. This is the Garden Route National Park.

programme.desc: Villains - Meet natures most wanted and see why the baddest of the bad dont get the respect they deserve. Admire the great white sharks electrical sensors, the razor-sharp limbs of the dead leaf mantis, and the zombie-creating powers of cordyceps fungi.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Coast - Massive elephant seals go nose to nose to win the title of beachmaster, and giant petrels earn the nickname, murderous garbagemen. Meanwhile, a female humpback goes to extremes to protect her calf from amorous males.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Katis territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystals move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep3
programme.desc: God's Darling: Beetles - Beetles have inhabited the Earth for more than 240 million years. There are around 380,000 kinds of beetles known to scientists and every year hundreds of new species are discovered. One fourth of the worlds animals are beetles. They have conquered almost every corner and every habitat on the planet and they have survived every global disaster. What is it that makes them so successful?

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Kruger's Pafuri - In the northern reaches of the Kruger National Park, life depends on one thing water. In a land burdened by heat and drought a single ribbon cuts its reliable course through the wilderness. Its a lifeline to all creatures, great and small.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Waiting for Winter - Its November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. But the ice - which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now - is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record. In late November, the temperature is 10 degrees warmer than its average. Climate change is wreaking havoc across the North. At just below zero degrees Celsius, the sea cannot freeze.

programme.desc: Punks on the Run - The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Katis territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystals move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Punks on the Run - The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep3
programme.desc: God's Darling: Beetles - Beetles have inhabited the Earth for more than 240 million years. There are around 380,000 kinds of beetles known to scientists and every year hundreds of new species are discovered. One fourth of the worlds animals are beetles. They have conquered almost every corner and every habitat on the planet and they have survived every global disaster. What is it that makes them so successful?

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Canada - Canada, where summer is short and time is tight any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep3
programme.desc: God's Darling: Beetles - Beetles have inhabited the Earth for more than 240 million years. There are around 380,000 kinds of beetles known to scientists and every year hundreds of new species are discovered. One fourth of the worlds animals are beetles. programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Macro Mozambique - The coast of Mozambique is home to giants, like humpbacks and whale sharks, but the tiniest species play just as big of a role in the ecosystem. Meet the scientists who are working against the clock to protect coastal creatures big and small.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Life in the Food Chain - The ocean sprawls across 70 percent of our planet and is home to as many as one million known species of plants and animals. However, it is the smallest of ocean creatures that underpins the worlds largest food web plankton. These microscopic organisms drift through the oceans diverse habitats, triggering feeding cycles in their wake. Without them, life in the ocean would cease to exist.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Augrabies Falls - Augrabies is where the mighty Orange River plunges over the awesome 56 meter Augrabies waterfall. Derived from a word oukurubes which means place of thunder in the indigenous language of the Nama-Khoi this land is the heart of a harsh and sun-beaten world with flashes of brilliant color and a thunderous roar.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Jaguars - Head out into the Pantanal with Lizzie and the Onafari team on the hunt for a missing dominant male jaguar. Monitor the battle between young hopefuls, like outsider Badalo, who want to usurp his power and win over Fera and the other local females.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Pawston \ Ruff Day on the Job - Tag wants to bring her new neighbor, Scooch, to the Party in the Tree. But a series of traffic jams make Tag impatient, and she keeps trying to find different ways to get to the party. Thanks to Tags handiness - and one of Lady Lydias hats - they make it to the party just in time. \ Pawstons new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep2
programme.desc: Dark Park Bark Lark \ The Fast and the Curious - Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippets Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, theres lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - theyre going to have to work together.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep9
programme.desc: Big Poppy / Neighbor War - When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Out of Control / Critter Comfort - Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep35
programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces fast food to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep57
programme.desc: Too Many Cats - A myriad of Puss clones pour forth from the portal, each with a different personality, until eventually an evil twin shows up to challenge the real Puss

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep5
programme.desc: Spinny Water / Kelp's Song - Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep5
programme.desc: Tree Troubles / Missing Pieces - When Marcus brings home the class tree sapling for the weekend, the Dew Drops see it starting to wilt and must cheer the sapling up, so Marcus can make sure to plant it for his class. / When Athena accidentally breaks Lola's nature sculpture, the Dew Drops must go on a scavenger hunt to replace the missing pieces.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep17
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Pawston - Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she cant perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesnt break her promise to the town.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep1
programme.desc: Everest Returns - Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yis violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yis music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep2
programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep1
programme.desc: How to Start a Dragon Academy - Hiccup is given the responsibility to integrate dragons into the village of Berk and must contend with his rowdy friends, unruly dragons and an upset village elder.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep2
programme.desc: Viking For Hire - Now that dragon-killing is no longer necessary, Hiccup tries to find a new job for Gobber the Blacksmith, but the task proves harder than expected.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: Animal House - As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep51
programme.desc: The Business Boss: Back in Baby - After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep52
programme.desc: The Stroll - Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep41
programme.desc: The Beginning of the End - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep1
programme.desc: Little Trouble in Big China - It's the Lunar New Year and Odlulu has accidentally brought a stone dragon to life! Wally and Wenda work with local siblings Li and Liu, members of a dragon dance team, to tame the dragon and keep the celebration from being ruined.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep1
programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep1
programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep27
programme.desc: Queen Of Police / Roidian Prom - When Tip takes over Kyle's job as "King of Police," she removes all rules from Boovsland and it descends into chaos; Tip and Oh accompany DieAnne to Roidian Prom

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep27
programme.desc: The Wrath Of Hughes - When Peabody and Sherman kill comedy in Ancient Greece, they team up with their alter egos to defeat a cyborg version of Mrs. Hughes and fix history

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep6
programme.desc: The Ticket Trail / Flying Solo - Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas' diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep6
programme.desc: Playground / Sparkless - Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelps fun-crastinating puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep42
programme.desc: Who Arted? - King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep64
programme.desc: Puppy Love - Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep3
programme.desc: Old Dog, New Tricks \ Snoozie-Hullabaloozie - Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4
programme.desc: Show Dog, Show \ Keys to Victory - Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sams big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep11
programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show / Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep37
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Prom - The gang joins King Julien at his Lemur School Reunion, but the party gets out of control when his old prom date, Karen, shows up for revenge.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep38
programme.desc: Eye Of The Clover - Clover wants to follow in her Grandma Rose's footsteps and compete at the dangerous Tournament of Doom, but King Julien forbids her to attend.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep58
programme.desc: Before They Hatch - A gargoyle with ties to San Lorenzo emerges from the portal and Puss must help find her hidden eggs before they hatch and feed on whatever or whoever is around!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep6
programme.desc: Playground / Sparkless - Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelps fun-crastinating puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep6
programme.desc: The Ticket Trail / Flying Solo - Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas' diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep18
programme.desc: Big Dog Job / The Case of the Slobbery - Tag tries to prove to Mom that shes a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. All she has to do is get them to the playground, but the pups keep running off. \ When a giant, bone-shaped, roller coaster ride goes missing from the Amusement Bark, Detectives Tag and Scooch take on the case of the slobbery robbery.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but hes missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewers water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: The Terrible Twos - When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragons bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep5
programme.desc: In Dragons We Trust - After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out whats really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep6
programme.desc: Alvin & the Outcasts - Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep5

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep6
programme.desc: Alvin & the Outcasts - Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep2
programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep2
programme.desc: Viking For Hire - Now that dragon-killing is no longer necessary, Hiccup tries to find a new job for Gobber the Blacksmith, but the task proves harder than expected.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep2
programme.desc: A Day in Turkey - Wally and Wenda go to Turkey to find a sleeping rug for Arf. They meet a fellow Wanderer, Yasemin, and realize that their Turkish rug is actually a map to the Doubling Key! Odlulu and Fritz find the key first and cause chaos as the W's try to escape from the underground Cistern.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep2
programme.desc: Scrapadactyls - When Revvit and his Reptool friends venture out of their ravine, the Dinotrux band together to save them from a flock of savage Scrapadactyls.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep2
programme.desc: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail - When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep2
programme.desc: Two Party System / Fun Branch - Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep28
programme.desc: Where The Koobish Roam / Best Friendiversary - On a Koobish cattle drive together, Tip and Krunkle's differences result in Oh and the herd getting lost in a stampede; Tip and Oh can't agree on how to celebrate their Friendiversary

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep28
programme.desc: Jump The Whale Shark / Frederic Bartholdi - When Sherman's friends crash the show for an impromptu beach party, he and his rival both do a trick jump over a whale shark to win over a girl

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 2 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.
