programme.desc: Everglades National Park, Florida - The Go Jetters save the Florida Everglades when hungry alligators chase Glitch's picnic.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep18
programme.desc: Nia's Bright Idea - Nia uses what she learns about lighthouses to suggest covering a big wheel in Christmas lights, so that Harold can see where he's going in a storm.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Sticker Swap - Sarah is keen to complete her sticker album, so sets off to see ifher friendscan help.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Dewy Morning - Sarah and Duck visit the art shop, but arrive early and must entertain themselves.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Kite - Stanley helps Little Woo and Seamus fly their new kite. It gets stuck up a tree and breaks. Using leaves and sticks, they build a better one, only for that to get stuck.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Heavy - Stanley and Morris put too many boxes on the barge and now one end is sinking and the other is lifting up. Stanley get's the townsfolk to help level it out.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep74
programme.desc: Purple Zappa - Monty gets a new toy robot and wonders whether it is better to keep it shiny and clean in the box or to have fun playing with it.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep33
programme.desc: It's Time to Help at the Farm - JoJo, Gran Gran and Cousin Lexi visit the farm. They find out how the animals keep warm in winter and Gran Gran has a plan to help Lucy the lama keep cosy!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Sheep Dog - Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Housework - Mum and Dad vow to only finish their boring housework when the kids stop acting silly, but that's never going to happen, so they end up trying the same approach themselves.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Pass the Parcel - Lucky's Dad is outraged that modern Pass the Parcel has a present in every layer and changes the rules back to only having one prize in the middle, but Bingo is forever losing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Polar Explorers - When Glitch and Kyan race to the south pole, Glitch's Grimbots steal the pole's marker.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Artichoke - Little artichoke sings about being the rhyming queen.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Brussels Sprout - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's tiny Brussels Sprout performing I'm Mighty and proving how great he is.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Come Back Cobs - The Cobs have finally had enough of Evil Pea's ungratefulness and team up with Supertato.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Big Net Rescue - Carrot is determined to save Supertato from Evil Pea's trap without help from Prickly Pear

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep91
programme.desc: Footprints - Tinky Winky, Dipsy and LaaLaa follow a trail of muddy footprints and find Po in bed with very muddy feet. The Noo-Noo cleans off the mud.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep15
programme.desc: O - Dee encourages a friend to say 'o', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We meet an octopus and an orangutan, and see an ostrich in an office!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Farmyard Runaways - Plom is looking after some new furry friends, specifically a heard of Alpacas. But when the Poppacas end up wandering off into the unknown, Plom has to find a way to get them back.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Mr Kite Takes Flight - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy monster is just about to take a bite out of his delicious green sock for breakfast, but before he can it gets blown away! He goes to OKIDO to find out why the wind is so blowy.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Pass the Parcel - Lucky's Dad is outraged that modern Pass the Parcel has a present in every layer and changes the rules back to only having one prize in the middle, but Bingo is forever losing.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Perfect - For her Father's Day card, Bluey sets out to draw a picture of herself and her father together. While recalling her favourite memories of playing with Bandit, Bluey struggles with the idea that her drawing must be perfect. Chilli tries to convince Bluey that perfection isn't easy, or absolutely necessary.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep37
programme.desc: The Traffic Badge - Duggee and the squirrels begin a trip to the lake, but get stuck in a traffic jam!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Water Badge - The squirrels learn all about where water comes from.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: The Continent of Europe - The Go Jetters help Grandmaster Glitch take his own souvenir selfies across Europe.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Continent of Africa - Glitch takes Tala to the continent of Africa to help her with an Academy project.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Shadowlands - On a picnic in the park, Bluey and her friends play Shadowlands. Coco keeps taking shortcuts so Bluey has to show her that following the rules can make the game more fun.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Daddy Robot - Bluey and Bingo don't want to tidy the playroom, so they get Daddy Robot to do it. But when Bluey takes things too far, Daddy Robot malfunctions!

programme.desc: Andy and the Weaver Ants - Andy jets off in his safari-mobile to Australia, discovering how weaver ants build a nest.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1803
programme.desc: Lightweight Title - When Khabib Nurmagomedov retired from MMA, the UFCs lightweight title was up for grabs. See the journey of the 155-pound belt following the Khabib Era on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Charles Oliveira, Dustin Poirier, Islam Makhachev, and more.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep706
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Battlegrounds: The Fighting Nerds, Debut Day: MIchael Venon Page, Day One: Michael Chandler, Front Row: Merab Dvalishvili" - Get an inside look at The Fighting Nerds, Sao Paulo's powerhouse squad. Michael 'Venom' Page takes us through his highly anticipated UFC debut. Michael Chandler takes us back to his unforgettable debut. And, we join Merab Dvalishvili Front Row at UFC 299 for Suga Sean O'Malley and Chito Vera."

programme.title: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA
programme.desc: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA - More than a title-winning machine, Pep Guardiola changed the face of football. Trace the evolution of his famed tiki-taka style of play that propelled the likes of Messi, Xavi, Iniesta and Busquets to footballing royalty.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC304EdwardsvsMuhammad2
programme.desc: UFC returns to Manchester, England with a stacked card. In the main event, Birminghams Leon Edwards defends his welterweight title for the third time against old rival Belal Muhammad, who brings a10-fight unbeaten streak into this long awaited rematch. In the co-main, Manchester's own Tom Aspinall seeks to retain his interim heavyweight belt vs heavy hitter Curtis Blaydes. All this and a whole lot more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep11
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1001VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: At UFC 266, The Ultimate Fighter coaching rivalry between featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski and Brian Ortega came to a head. Relive the action like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS - Predatory finishing & net-busting missiles from long range. A celebration of Quique de Lucas one of LaLigas longest serving attacking talents.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kape vs. Almabayev
programme.desc: Prelims - A UFC Flyweight title eliminator between former LFA Flyweight Champion (also former title challenger) Brandon Royval and former RIZIN Bantamweight Champion Manel Kape was expected to headline the event. However, Royval withdrew due to an undisclosed injury. He was replaced by Asu Almabayev. Albamayev was originally expected to face former flyweight title challenger Steve Erceg at the event, but the latter was moved to headline UFC on ESPN: Moreno vs. Erceg and replaced by Allan Nascimento. Nascimento was in turn pulled from the event after the latest changes

programme.desc: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA - More than a title-winning machine, Pep Guardiola changed the face of football. Trace the evolution of his famed tiki-taka style of play that propelled the likes of Messi, Xavi, Iniesta and Busquets to footballing royalty.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC304EdwardsvsMuhammad2
programme.desc: UFC returns to Manchester, England with a stacked card. In the main event, Birminghams Leon Edwards defends his welterweight title for the third time against old rival Belal Muhammad, who brings a10-fight unbeaten streak into this long awaited rematch. In the co-main, Manchester's own Tom Aspinall seeks to retain his interim heavyweight belt vs heavy hitter Curtis Blaydes. All this and a whole lot more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep11
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1001VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: At UFC 266, The Ultimate Fighter coaching rivalry between featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski and Brian Ortega came to a head. Relive the action like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1803
programme.desc: Lightweight Title - When Khabib Nurmagomedov retired from MMA, the UFCs lightweight title was up for grabs. See the journey of the 155-pound belt following the Khabib Era on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Charles Oliveira, Dustin Poirier, Islam Makhachev, and more.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kape vs. Almabayev
programme.desc: Prelims - A UFC Flyweight title eliminator between former LFA Flyweight Champion (also former title challenger) Brandon Royval and former RIZIN Bantamweight Champion Manel Kape was expected to headline the event. However, Royval withdrew due to an undisclosed injury. He was replaced by Asu Almabayev. Albamayev was originally expected to face former flyweight title challenger Steve Erceg at the event, but the latter was moved to headline UFC on ESPN: Moreno vs. Erceg and replaced by Allan Nascimento. Nascimento was in turn pulled from the event after the latest changes
